    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_9772b84b0d69664d9d93b8f6e0dca56bf2d0c6a6</entry>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_9772b84b0d69664d9d93b8f6e0dca56bf2d0c6a6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnetic field through a solenoid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetisch fangen Sie durch ein 
Solenoid auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Champ magnétique par un solénoïde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Campo magnético através de um solenóide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Campo magnetico tramite un solenoide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγνητικό πεδίο μέσω ενός σωληνοειδούς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Campo magnético a través de un solenoide</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a magnetic field passes through the area of the coil centre. This can be used in an exercise that calculates the amount of flux passing through the solenoid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic flux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic flux density</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solenoid coils</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">turns</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß ein magnetisches
Durchläufe durch den Bereich der Spule Mitte auffangen. 
Dieses kann in einer Übung verwendet werden, die die Menge des 
Flusses überschreiten durch das Solenoid errechnet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre des passages d'un champ
magnétique par la zone du centre d'enroulement. Ceci peut être
utilisé dans un exercice qui calcule la quantité de flux passant par
le solénoïde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra passagens de um campo 
magnético com a área do centro da bobina. Isto pode ser usado 
em um exercício que calcule a quantidade de fluxo que passa através 
do solenóide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i passaggi del campo 
magnetico con la zona del centro della bobina. Ciò può essere 
usata in un'esercitazione che calcola la quantità di cambiamento 
continuo che passa tramite il solenoide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει περάσματα μαγνητικών 
πεδίων μέσω του τομέα του κέντρου πηνίων. Αυτό μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια άσκηση που υπολογίζει το ποσό ροής που 
περνά μέσω του σωληνοειδούς.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra pasos de un campo 
magnético con el área del centro de la bobina. Esto se puede 
utilizar en un ejercicio que calcule la cantidad de flux que pasa a 
través del solenoide.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetischer Fluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetische Flußdichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solenoidspulen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umdrehungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">flux magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">densité magnétique de flux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enroulements de solénoïde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tours</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fluxo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">densidade magnética do fluxo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bobinas do solenóide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">voltas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamento continuo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">densità magnetica di cambiamento continuo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bobine del solenoide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">girate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πυκνότητα μαγνητικής ροής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πηνία σωληνοειδών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στροφές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">flux magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">densidad magnética del flux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bobinas del solenoide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
